description: [DarkTortilla](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1066) can obtain system information by querying the `Win32_ComputerSystem`, `Win32_BIOS`, `Win32_MotherboardDevice`, `Win32_PnPEntity`, and `Win32_DiskDrive` WMI objects.(Citation: Secureworks DarkTortilla Aug 2022)

external_references.description: Secureworks Counter Threat Unit Research Team. (2022, August 17). DarkTortilla Malware Analysis. Retrieved November 3, 2022.
